user_query: he sold me the building don't you sass me boy this is a white building you can't own this place I can offer you a buck fifty an hour that's great and you're fine with working for me your money is green that's the only concern about color I got and I like the idea of watching you build a business you know something I'd like to do again myself one day again yeah I tried something a few years back drive-in ice cream shop it turns out people don't want to eat ice cream while driving their cars are you serious oh yeah we received a complaint about you Miss Cooper in apartment 28 is not like you working in the building she said you were impersonating the owner of the building try to be more respectful to your tenants sorry for the inconvenience you can't be here after 6 p.m. I'm a resident I'm moving in impressive you have the knack of knowing the untapped value of the building you'll work the phones with me work the investors but when we need a face to sign a deal that'll be me since you're really sleeping in late Mrs. Barker would like to offer a buyout for your interest in all the Barker Garrett properties I have no reason to sell I'm happy running the buildings on my own that's unacceptable I don't want to be in business with I need to see Mr. Reed Mr. Reed can't see anybody without an appointment this is urgent image foreign buildings 17. 17. 18 if you count the club my mother was a real estate agent I want to buy it I want us to buy that's a mighty big building to buy on the

entities.entity_description: Miss Cooper는 28번 아파트에 거주하는 세입자로, 건물에서 일하는 주인공에 대해 불만을 제기한 인물이다
Mrs. Barker는 Barker Garrett 부동산 회사의 관계자로, 주인공의 부동산 지분을 매입하려고 제안하는 인물이다
Mr. Reed는 예약 없이는 만날 수 없는 중요한 인물로, 주인공이 긴급하게 만나려고 하는 사람이다
주인공은 건물을 매입하고 부동산 사업을 운영하는 인물로, 인종차별적 환경에서 사업을 성공시키려 노력한다. 건물의 숨겨진 가치를 알아보는 능력이 있다고 평가받는다
건물 판매자는 주인공에게 건물을 판매한 백인 남성으로, 과거에 드라이브인 아이스크림 가게 사업에 실패한 경험이 있다

relationships.relationship_description: Miss Cooper는 주인공이 건물 소유주를 사칭한다며 불만을 제기했다
Mrs. Barker는 주인공의 Barker Garrett 부동산 지분을 매입하려고 제안했다
건물 판매자는 주인공에게 건물을 팔고 시간당 1달러 50센트의 일자리를 제안했다
주인공의 어머니는 부동산 중개인이었으며, 이것이 주인공의 부동산 사업에 영향을 주었을 것으로 보인다
